title: 08/27/21 DPS Hour 2 Glenn Ordway
itunes:title: 08/27/21 DPS Hour 2 Glenn Ordway
description:
Glenn Ordway tells Dan that the 2004 Red Sox winning it all changed Boston sports. Glenn says Tom Brady is the biggest sports person that he covered in Boston sports since Larry Bird.
